alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:02PM MDT until August 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 601 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Intersection of Highway 73 and White River, or 10 miles southeast of Kadoka, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Jackson County, northeast of Wanblee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
